title: About
text: Hello! I am Sampsun Martenson and I am a sports fan that is interested in the data side of what goes into everything. For this blog I will focus on things like hockey and football since those are sports which I know a lot about. I hope you like what you find on this page and feel free to make your own blog if what you see inspires you.

title: The Dominance of the 2022 Colorado Avalanche
text:
In 2022 the Colorado Avalanche had one of the most dominant hockey seasons of all time.
